PackageOracle.name: PKG_VNT_RECON_OOR_ORDER_OPEN
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.PKG_VNT_RECON_OOR_ORDER_OPEN
IS
/***********************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : pkg_vnt_recon_oor_order_open
|| CREATED BY : Cognizant
|| CREATED DATE : 01-FEB-2015
|| SUBJECT AREA : Order
|| DESCRIPITION : The package pkg_vnt_process_rrt_oor_order controls the reconciliation of the
|| Vantage RRT_OOR_ORDER_OPEN table and applying those updates to SOLODB.

Change log:

Changed By Changed On Description
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 08-FEB-2015 Standardization Changes and Remove c_record_active
************************************************************************************************************************/
PROCEDURE process (
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_max_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_reminder_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_batchsize NUMBER DEFAULT 1000);
END PKG_VNT_RECON_OOR_ORDER_OPEN;

body.name: PKG_VNT_RECON_OOR_ORDER_OPEN
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.PKG_VNT_RECON_OOR_ORDER_OPEN
IS
/*******************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : pkg_vnt_recon_oor_order_open
|| CREATED BY : Cognizant
|| CREATED DATE : 01-FEB-2015
|| SUBJECT AREA : Order
|| DESCRIPITION : The package pkg_vnt_recon_oor_order_open controls the reconciliation of the
|| Vantage RRT_OOR_ORDER_OPEN table and applying those updates to SOLODB.
|| Change log:
|| Changed By Changed On Change Description
|| ------------------------- -------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 08-FEB-2015 Standardization Changes and Remove c_record_active
|| Cognizant 25-FEB-2015 Independant insert handled for t_bus_interact_party_role
|| Cognizant 04-MAR-2015 Audit logging modified
|| Cognizant 05-MAR-2015 ADDING REQ In The bus_interact_party_role (defect 33)
|| Cognizant 13-MAR-2015 Table t_bus_interact removed from cursor
|| Cognizant 16-Mar-2015 Syching of column level population logic between Recon and Initial of NRT/RRT Packages
|| Cognizant 30-MAR-2015 Modified cursor query to support ROWID based multithreading
|| Cognizant 07-Apr-2015 Code changes to remove the descrepanies between NRT/RRT , Initial Load and Reconciliation.
|| Cognizant 10-Apr-2015 Trim included for character column in cursor query.
|| Karthik 29-Apr-2015 Modified the table structure of T_BUS_INTERACT to have a new column
|| BUS_INTERACT_USAGE_TYPE_CD
|| Kamal 09-Jul-2015 commented out party_nm
*******************************************************************************************************************/
SUBTYPE t_unit_name IS VARCHAR2 (30);

SUBTYPE t_userid IS VARCHAR2 (100 BYTE);

-- CONSTANTS
c_pkg_name CONSTANT t_unit_name
:= 'PKG_VNT_RECON_OOR_ORDER_OPEN';
c_special_request_cd CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'M';
-- EXCEPTION CONSTANTS
c_bulk_errors EXCEPTION;
l_audit_recon stg.audit_recon_process%ROWTYPE;
l_current_recon_start_time stg.recon_process_ctrl.recon_start_dttm%TYPE;
l_table_key stg.audit_recon_process.table_key%TYPE;
g_process_record_cnt NUMBER := 0;
g_error_record_cnt NUMBER := 0;
g_max_thread NUMBER := 1;
g_reminder_thread NUMBER := 1;
g_batchsize NUMBER := 1;
l_log_status VARCHAR2 (1);
PRAGMA EXCEPTION_INIT (c_bulk_errors, -24381);

-- CURSOR
CURSOR cur_stg_rrt_oor_order
IS
SELECT CASE
WHEN roor.sys_oor = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END AS data_source_type_cd,
roor.ROWID AS ID, roor.record_load_cd,
cust_xref.party_id AS customer_id,
addr_xref.address_id AS service_address_id,
ord_xref.bus_interact_id,
DECODE (roor.ord_class_oor,
c_special_request_cd, pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_splreq,
pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_prdord
) request_type_cd,
roor.cust_acct_no_oor AS cust_acct_num,
roor.order_no_oor AS order_no,
TRIM (roor.ord_stat_oor) AS ord_stat_oor,

--bi.bus_interact_type_cd, -- Commented on 13_Mar-2015 by Cognizant.
TRIM (roor.compl_cde_oor) AS completion_cd,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.compl_cde_oor, 1, 3)) AS completion_cd1,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.compl_cde_oor, 4, 3)) AS completion_cd2,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.compl_cde_oor, 7, 3)) AS completion_cd3,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.compl_cde_oor, 10, 3)) AS completion_cd4,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.compl_cde_oor, 13, 3)) AS completion_cd5,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.compl_cde_oor, 16, 3)) AS completion_cd6,
TRIM (roor.ord_rsn_oor) AS reason_cd,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.ord_rsn_oor, 1, 2)) AS reason_cd1,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.ord_rsn_oor, 3, 2)) AS reason_cd2,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.ord_rsn_oor, 5, 2)) AS reason_cd3,
TRIM (SUBSTR (roor.ord_rsn_oor, 7, 2)) AS reason_cd4,
DECODE
(roor.create_dte_oor,
TO_DATE ('00010101', 'YYYYMMDD'), NULL,
TO_TIMESTAMP ( TO_CHAR (roor.create_dte_oor, 'YYYY.MM.DD')
|| '.'
|| roor.create_tme_oor,
'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24.MI.SS'
)
) order_create_ts,
DECODE
(roor.compl_dte_oor,
TO_DATE ('00010101', 'YYYYMMDD'), NULL,
TO_TIMESTAMP ( TO_CHAR (roor.compl_dte_oor, 'YYYY.MM.DD')
|| '.'
|| roor.compl_tme_oor,
'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24.MI.SS'
)
) order_completion_ts
FROM stg.vnt_oor_order_open_rec_delta roor LEFT OUTER JOIN t_party_vantage_xref cust_xref
ON cust_xref.cust_acct_num = roor.cust_acct_no_oor
AND cust_xref.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_service_address_vantage_xref addr_xref
ON addr_xref.hs_key = roor.hse_key_oor
AND addr_xref.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref ord_xref
ON ord_xref.ord_no = roor.order_no_oor
AND ord_xref.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
-- LEFT OUTER JOIN t_bus_interact bi -- Commented on 13March-2015 by Cognizant
-- ON bi.bus_interact_id = ord_xref.bus_interact_id
-- AND bi.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
WHERE roor.record_load_cd IS NULL
AND MOD (ASCII (SUBSTR (roor.ROWID, LENGTH (roor.ROWID), 1)),
g_max_thread
) = (g_reminder_thread - 1);

--and MOD(roor.SYS_OOR,g_max_thread ) = (g_reminder_thread - 1)
TYPE t_cursor_data_tbl IS TABLE OF cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE
INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

-- Forward declarations
PROCEDURE update_staging (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
--p_cursor_data_i IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE
);

PROCEDURE create_customer (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE
);

PROCEDURE create_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_cancel (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_reason (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE update_spec_req_cancel (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE update_spec_req_reason (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE process (
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_max_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_reminder_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_batchsize NUMBER DEFAULT 1000
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : process
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPITION : The procedure process will open the cursor and execute the records for
|| create stub customer as needed to support the order, lookup the order in
|| case it was created earlier in the run, update the order, create the
|| order and update the order with Update the staging rows with status
****************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'PROCESS';
l_process_name t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_process_rec pkg_logging.t_process_rec;
l_cursor_data t_cursor_data_tbl;
l_bus_interact t_bus_interact%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
l_process_rec.process_name := l_process_name;
pkg_logging.begin_process (l_process_rec,
'p_audit_user_i=' || p_audit_user_i
);
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name || ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);
g_max_thread := p_max_thread;
g_reminder_thread := p_reminder_thread;
g_batchsize := p_batchsize;
g_process_record_cnt := 0;
g_error_record_cnt := 0;

IF pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name)
THEN
RETURN;
END IF;

IF (cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_rrt_oor_order;
END IF;

SELECT recon_start_dttm
INTO l_current_recon_start_time
FROM stg.recon_process_ctrl
WHERE record_stat = pkg_utility.c_stg_in_progress;

OPEN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order;

LOOP
FETCH cur_stg_rrt_oor_order
BULK COLLECT INTO l_cursor_data LIMIT g_batchsize;

IF (l_cursor_data.COUNT () > 0)
THEN
FOR i IN 1 .. l_cursor_data.COUNT
LOOP
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ' ,Processing order_no='
|| l_cursor_data (i).order_no
);
create_customer (l_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i,
l_cursor_data (i)
);

IF l_cursor_data (i).record_load_cd IS NULL
THEN
create_order (l_process_rec,
l_cursor_data (i),
p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

update_staging (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data (i));
COMMIT;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', ORDER_NO = '
|| l_cursor_data (i).order_no
|| ', BUS_INTERACT_ID = '
|| l_cursor_data (i).bus_interact_id
|| ', EXCEPTION = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);
l_cursor_data (i).record_load_cd :=
pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
END;
END LOOP;
END IF;

EXIT WHEN l_cursor_data.COUNT () < g_batchsize
OR pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name);
END LOOP;

CLOSE cur_stg_rrt_oor_order;

pkg_logging.process_log_detail_populate
(p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_bucket_i => pkg_utility.c_prcssed_rec_text,
p_audit_value_i => g_process_record_cnt,
p_process_id_i => l_process_rec.process_id,
p_in_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
pkg_logging.process_log_detail_populate
(p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_bucket_i => pkg_utility.c_error_rec_text,
p_audit_value_i => g_error_record_cnt,
p_process_id_i => l_process_rec.process_id,
p_in_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, pkg_utility.c_process_success);
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name || ' ' || pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', exception='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, pkg_utility.c_process_error);

IF (cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_rrt_oor_order;
END IF;

RAISE;
END process;

PROCEDURE create_customer (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : PROCEDURE create_customer
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPITION : The procedure create_customer do execute for party,customer and
|| party_vantage_xref
****************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'CREATE_CUSTOMER';
l_party_row t_party%ROWTYPE;
l_customer_row t_customer%ROWTYPE;
l_party_vantage_xref_row t_party_vantage_xref%ROWTYPE;
l_customer_id t_customer.customer_id%TYPE;
l_party_id t_party_vantage_xref.party_id%TYPE;
l_account_id NUMBER;
l_log_status VARCHAR2 (1);
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', cust_acct_num='
|| p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num
);
l_customer_id := '';
l_party_id := '';
l_account_id := '';
l_log_status := '';

BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', creating customer'
);

SELECT xref.party_id, c.customer_id
INTO l_party_id, l_customer_id
FROM t_party_vantage_xref xref INNER JOIN t_party p
ON xref.party_id = p.party_id
LEFT JOIN t_customer c ON xref.party_id = c.customer_id
WHERE xref.cust_acct_num = p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
NULL;
END;

p_cursor_row_io.customer_id := l_customer_id;

IF l_party_id IS NULL
THEN
p_cursor_row_io.customer_id :=
da_party.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
source_system_party_id => p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num,
party_subtype_cd => NULL,
party_child_subtype_cd => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

IF l_customer_id IS NULL
THEN
da_customer.ADD (p_process_rec_i,
external_customer_id => NULL,
customer_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
first_contact_dt => NULL,
first_fulfillment => NULL,
first_payment => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

IF l_party_id IS NULL
THEN
da_party_vantage_xref.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
cust_acct_num => p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num,
party_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

IF l_log_status = 'Y'
THEN
l_audit_recon.operation_perf := pkg_utility.c_recon_insert_perform;
l_audit_recon.table_name := 'T_CUSTOMER';
l_table_key :=
'CUST_ACCT_NUM = '
|| p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num
|| ', CUSTOMER_ID'
|| p_cursor_row_io.customer_id;
-- l_audit_recon.modif_values := 'DATA_SOURCE_TYPE_CD = '|| p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd ||', '||'AUDIT_USER = '|| p_audit_user_i;
pkg_vnt_recon_process.audit_recon_process_populate
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_table_name => l_audit_recon.table_name,
p_table_key => l_table_key,
p_modif_values => NULL,
p_account_details => NULL,
p_operation_perf => l_audit_recon.operation_perf,
p_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ' ' || pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd := pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' ,order_no='
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
|| ', cust_acct_num='
|| p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num
|| ' , Error='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END create_customer;

PROCEDURE create_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure create_order_detl
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This Procedure will create ticket by inserting the records into the table
|| t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref by inserting details for ticket, ticket status,
|| prod_order_completion and prod_order_reason.
*****************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'CREATE_ORDER';
l_current_special_request t_special_request%ROWTYPE;
l_special_request_status t_special_request_status%ROWTYPE;
l_current_request t_request%ROWTYPE;
l_customer_order_row t_customer_order%ROWTYPE;
l_prod_order_row t_prod_order%ROWTYPE;
l_prod_order_status_row t_prod_order_status%ROWTYPE;
--l_bus_interact_row t_bus_interact%ROWTYPE;
l_bus_interact_id t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE;
l_bus_interact_id_role t_bus_interact_party_role.bus_interact_id%TYPE;
l_bus_interact_id_xref t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE;
l_request_interaction_id t_request.request_interaction_id%TYPE;
l_count NUMBER;
l_ins_up_ind VARCHAR2 (1);
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', order_no='
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
);
l_ins_up_ind := '';
l_count := 0;
l_log_status := '';
l_bus_interact_id_role := '';
l_bus_interact_id := '';
l_request_interaction_id := '';

BEGIN
SELECT a.bus_interact_id, b.request_interaction_id
INTO l_bus_interact_id, l_request_interaction_id
FROM t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref xref INNER JOIN t_bus_interact a
ON a.bus_interact_id = xref.bus_interact_id
LEFT JOIN t_request b
ON b.request_interaction_id = xref.bus_interact_id
AND b.request_type_cd IN
(pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_prdord,
pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_splreq
)
--AND b.request_type_cd IN ('PRORD', 'SPREQ')
WHERE ord_no = p_cursor_row_io.order_no;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN -- l_log_status := 'Y';
-- IF l_bus_interact_id IS NULL THEN
l_bus_interact_id :=
da_bus_interact.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
source_system_id => p_cursor_row_io.order_no,
bus_interact_type_cd => pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req,
bus_interact_usage_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id := l_bus_interact_id;
da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.ADD (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.order_no,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END;

IF (l_log_status = 'Y')
THEN
l_ins_up_ind := 'I';
END IF;

IF l_request_interaction_id IS NULL
THEN
da_request.ADD (p_process_rec_i,
request_interaction_id => l_bus_interact_id,
request_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

-- Added on 25FEB2015 by Cognizant --
BEGIN
SELECT bus_interact_id
INTO l_bus_interact_id_role
FROM t_bus_interact_party_role
WHERE bus_interact_id = l_bus_interact_id
AND party_id = p_cursor_row_io.customer_id
AND party_role_cd = 'CUST';
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
da_bus_interact_party_role.ADD -- Added by Cognizant on 18 FEB
(p_process_rec_i,
bus_interact_id => l_bus_interact_id,
party_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
party_role_cd => 'CUST',
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
source_system_party_id => p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num,
-- bus_interact_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_type_cd,
bus_interact_type_cd => pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req,
--Defect 33
effective_dttm => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END;

-- Added on 25FEB2015 by Cognizant --

/* IF l_bus_interact_id IS NULL THEN -- Commented on 18 FEB
da_bus_interact_party_role.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
bus_interact_id => l_bus_interact_id,
party_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
party_role_cd => 'CUST',
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
source_system_party_id => p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num,
bus_interact_type_cd => pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req,
effective_dttm => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;*/
IF (p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd =
pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_prdord
)
THEN
-- -- customer order
BEGIN
SELECT *
INTO l_customer_order_row
FROM t_customer_order a
WHERE a.customer_order_id = l_bus_interact_id;

IF ( (l_customer_order_row.customer_id <>
p_cursor_row_io.customer_id
)
AND NVL (l_customer_order_row.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) < l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_customer_order a
SET customer_id = p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE customer_order_id = l_bus_interact_id
--AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time and customer_id <> p_cursor_row_io.customer_id;
;

IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
da_customer_order.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
customer_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
customer_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
customer_order_type_cd => NULL,
customer_order_action_cd => NULL,
assigned_priority_cd => NULL,
due_dt => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END;

BEGIN
SELECT *
INTO l_prod_order_row
FROM t_prod_order a
WHERE a.product_order_id = l_bus_interact_id;

IF ( ( NVL (l_prod_order_row.actual_completion_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
)
OR NVL (l_prod_order_row.product_order_create_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
)
OR NVL (l_prod_order_row.reason_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
)
OR NVL (l_prod_order_row.completion_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
)
OR NVL (l_prod_order_row.service_address_id,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_number
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_number
)
)
AND NVL (l_prod_order_row.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) < l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_prod_order a
SET a.actual_completion_dttm =
p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
a.product_order_create_dttm =
p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
a.reason_cd = p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
a.completion_cd = p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
service_address_id = p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE product_order_id = l_bus_interact_id;

--AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time
-- and ( actual_completion_dttm <> p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts OR
--reason_cd <> p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd OR
--completion_cd <> p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd OR
--service_address_id <> p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id )
IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
da_prod_order.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
actual_completion_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
product_order_create_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
requested_completion_dt => NULL,
reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
dnis_cd => NULL,
cancel_cd => NULL,
service_address_id => p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
bill_start_dt => NULL,
bill_stop_dt => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END;

BEGIN
SELECT *
INTO l_prod_order_status_row
FROM t_prod_order_status a
WHERE a.product_order_id = l_bus_interact_id;

IF ( (l_prod_order_status_row.product_order_status_cd <>
p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor
)
AND NVL (l_prod_order_status_row.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) < l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_prod_order_status a
SET a.product_order_status_cd = p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id
--AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time
;

IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
da_prod_order_status.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_status_cd => p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END;

BEGIN
-- IF l_log_status ='Y' THEN
IF (p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor = 'X')
THEN
update_prod_order_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1,
1,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2,
2,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3,
3,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4,
4,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5,
5,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6,
6,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1,
1,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2,
2,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3,
3,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
l_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4,
4,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
--END IF;
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
SELECT *
INTO l_current_special_request
FROM t_special_request a
WHERE a.special_request_id = l_bus_interact_id;

IF ( ( NVL (l_current_special_request.reason_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
)
OR NVL (l_current_special_request.completion_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_string
)
OR NVL (l_current_special_request.service_address_id,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_number
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_number
)
OR NVL (l_current_special_request.actual_completion_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
)
OR NVL (l_current_special_request.create_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) <>
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
)
)
AND NVL (l_current_special_request.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) < l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_special_request a
SET a.reason_cd = p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
a.completion_cd = p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
a.service_address_id =
p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
a.actual_completion_dttm =
p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
a.create_dttm = p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.special_request_id = l_bus_interact_id
--AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time
;

IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
da_special_request.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
actual_completion_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
create_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
requested_completion_dt => NULL,
reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
dnis_cd => NULL,
cancel_cd => NULL,
service_address_id => p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
bill_start_dt => NULL,
bill_stop_dt => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END;

BEGIN
SELECT *
INTO l_special_request_status
FROM t_special_request_status a
WHERE a.special_request_id = l_bus_interact_id;

IF ( (l_special_request_status.special_request_status_cd <>
p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor
)
AND NVL (l_special_request_status.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm
) < l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_special_request_status a
SET a.special_request_status_cd =
p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id
--AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time
;

-- and a.special_request_status_cd <> p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor;
IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
da_special_request_status.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_status_cd => p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END;

-- IF l_log_status = 'Y' THEN
IF (p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_oor = 'X')
THEN
update_spec_req_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1,
1,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2,
2,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3,
3,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4,
4,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5,
5,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_cancel (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6,
6,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

-- special_request_reason
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1,
1,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2,
2,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3,
3,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4,
4,
p_cursor_row_io,
p_audit_user_i
);
--END IF;
END IF;

IF l_log_status = 'Y'
THEN
l_audit_recon.table_name := 'T_BUS_INTERACT';
l_table_key :=
'SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID' || ' = ' || p_cursor_row_io.order_no;

IF l_ins_up_ind IS NULL
THEN
l_audit_recon.operation_perf :=
pkg_utility.c_recon_update_perform;
l_audit_recon.modif_values :=
'DATA_SOURCE_TYPE_CD'
|| '='
|| p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd
|| ', '
|| 'SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID'
|| '='
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
|| ', '
|| 'BUS_INTERACT_TYPE_CD'
|| '='
|| pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req
|| ', '
|| 'BUS_INTERACT_ID'
|| '='
|| l_bus_interact_id
|| ', '
|| 'AUDIT_USER='
|| p_audit_user_i;
ELSIF l_ins_up_ind = 'I'
THEN
l_audit_recon.operation_perf :=
pkg_utility.c_recon_insert_perform;
l_audit_recon.modif_values := '';
END IF;

pkg_vnt_recon_process.audit_recon_process_populate
(p_process_rec_i => p_process_rec_i,
p_table_name => l_audit_recon.table_name,
p_table_key => l_table_key,
p_modif_values => l_audit_recon.modif_values,
p_account_details => NULL,
p_operation_perf => l_audit_recon.operation_perf,
p_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ' ' || pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd := pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', order_no = '
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
|| ', l_bus_interact_id = '
|| l_bus_interact_id
|| ', request_type_cd = '
|| p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd
|| ', exception = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END create_order;

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_cancel (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : PROCEDURE update_prod_order_cancel
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPITION : The procedure update_prod_order_cancel will update t_prod_order_cancel table.
****************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_PROD_ORDER_CANCEL';
l_cancel t_prod_order_cancel%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_bus_interact_id_i
);

BEGIN
SELECT a.*
INTO l_cancel
FROM t_prod_order_cancel a
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF (p_code_i IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_cancel.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active)
THEN --'A') THEN
da_prod_order_cancel.del
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_cancel.product_order_id,
product_order_cancel_cd => l_cancel.product_order_cancel_cd,
data_source_type_cd => l_cancel.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => l_cancel.code_sequence_num,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
IF ( l_cancel.product_order_cancel_cd <> p_code_i
AND NVL (l_cancel.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) <
l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_prod_order_cancel a
SET a.product_order_cancel_cd = p_code_i,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = l_cancel.data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i
--AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time ;
-- AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time ;
;

IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record found in T_PROD_ORDER_CANCEL table'
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
IF (p_code_i IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_cancel.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => p_bus_interact_id_i,
product_order_cancel_cd => p_code_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => p_sequence_i,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record Not found in T_PROD_ORDER_CANCEL table'
);
END;
END update_prod_order_cancel;

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_reason (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/*******************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : PROCEDURE update_prod_order_reason
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPITION : The procedure update_prod_order_reason will update t_prod_order_reason table.
*******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_PROD_ORDER_REASON';
l_reason t_prod_order_reason%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_bus_interact_id_i
);

BEGIN
SELECT a.*
INTO l_reason
FROM t_prod_order_reason a
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF (p_code_i IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_reason.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.del
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_reason.product_order_id,
product_order_reason_cd => l_reason.product_order_reason_cd,
data_source_type_cd => l_reason.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => l_reason.code_sequence_num,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
IF ( l_reason.product_order_reason_cd <> p_code_i
AND NVL (l_reason.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) <
l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_prod_order_reason a
SET a.product_order_reason_cd = p_code_i,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = l_reason.data_source_type_cd
-- AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time;
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;
-- AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time;

IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record found in T_PROD_ORDER_REASON table'
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
IF (p_code_i IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => p_bus_interact_id_i,
product_order_reason_cd => p_code_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => p_sequence_i,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record Not found in T_PROD_ORDER_REASON table'
);
END;
END update_prod_order_reason;

PROCEDURE update_spec_req_cancel (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/*******************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : PROCEDURE update_spec_req_cancel
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPITION : The procedure update_spec_req_cancel will update t_special_request_cancel table.
*******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_SPEC_REQ_CANCEL';
l_cancel t_special_request_cancel%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_bus_interact_id_i
);

BEGIN
SELECT a.*
INTO l_cancel
FROM t_special_request_cancel a
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF (p_code_i IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_cancel.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active)
THEN
da_special_request_cancel.del
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_cancel.special_request_id,
special_request_cancel_cd => l_cancel.special_request_cancel_cd,
data_source_type_cd => l_cancel.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => l_cancel.code_sequence_num,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
IF ( l_cancel.special_request_cancel_cd <> p_code_i
AND NVL (l_cancel.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) <
l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_special_request_cancel a
SET a.special_request_cancel_cd = p_code_i,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = l_cancel.data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i
-- AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time ;
;

IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record found in T_SPECIAL_REQUEST_CANCEL table'
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
IF (p_code_i IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_cancel.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => p_bus_interact_id_i,
special_request_cancel_cd => p_code_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => p_sequence_i,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record Not found in T_SPECIAL_REQUEST_CANCEL table'
);
END;
END update_spec_req_cancel;

PROCEDURE update_spec_req_reason (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_cursor_row_i IN cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/******************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : PROCEDURE update_spec_req_cancel
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPITION : The procedure update_spec_req_reason will update t_special_request_reason table.
*******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_SPEC_REQ_REASON';
l_reason t_special_request_reason%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_bus_interact_id_i
);

BEGIN
SELECT a.*
INTO l_reason
FROM t_special_request_reason a
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF (p_code_i IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_reason.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active)
THEN --'A') THEN
da_special_request_reason.del
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_reason.special_request_id,
special_request_reason_cd => l_reason.special_request_reason_cd,
data_source_type_cd => l_reason.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => l_reason.code_sequence_num,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
IF ( l_reason.special_request_reason_cd <> p_code_i
AND NVL (l_reason.modified_dttm,
pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) <
l_current_recon_start_time
)
THEN
UPDATE t_special_request_reason a
SET a.special_request_reason_cd = p_code_i,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = l_reason.data_source_type_cd
--AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i AND NVL (modified_dttm, pkg_utility.c_recon_null_dttm) < l_current_recon_start_time;
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF SQL%ROWCOUNT > 0
THEN
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;
END IF;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record found in T_SPECIAL_REQUEST_REASON table'
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
IF (p_code_i IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => p_bus_interact_id_i,
special_request_reason_cd => p_code_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_i.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => p_sequence_i,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
l_log_status := 'Y';
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ' '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ' Record Not found in T_SPECIAL_REQUEST_REASON table'
);
END;
END update_spec_req_reason;

PROCEDURE update_staging (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
--p_cursor_data_i IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_oor_order%ROWTYPE
)
IS
/*******************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : PROCEDURE update_staging
|| ESTIMATED RUN TIME :
|| DESCRIPITION : The procedure update_staging will update stg.vnt_oor_order_open_rec_delta table.
*******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_STAGING';
l_systimestamp TIMESTAMP;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);

BEGIN
UPDATE stg.vnt_oor_order_open_rec_delta
SET record_load_cd =
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd,
pkg_utility.c_stg_processed
),
record_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE ROWID = p_cursor_row_io.ID;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd := pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', ORDER_NO = '
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
|| ', CUSTOMER_ID = '
|| p_cursor_row_io.customer_id
|| ', exception = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END;

IF NVL (p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd, pkg_utility.c_stg_processed) =
pkg_utility.c_stg_processed
THEN
g_process_record_cnt := g_process_record_cnt + 1;
END IF;

IF p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd = pkg_utility.c_stg_error
THEN
g_error_record_cnt := g_error_record_cnt + 1;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ' ' || pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
END update_staging;

END pkg_vnt_recon_oor_order_open;
